description: Documented direct venous/arterial blood loss from a surgery. This is distinct from GI bleeding or bleeding from a drain.
External drains placed into a body cavity of the patient other than the alimentary canal
Losses via the GI tract through the mouth, anus, or external tube.
output_group_examples: nasogastric_tube, orogastric_tube, emesis, rectal_tube, ileostomy, gastrojejunostomy_tube

description: Any additional fluid output not captured by the above
Fluid drained via single procedure without indwelling drain
Upper or lower respiratory system output
Net ultrafiltration from dialysis via ultrafiltration. Do not include removal of replacement fluid in CVVH or CVVHDF as this should be accounted for already.
Urine output representing fluid produced by the kidney(s). Can be from the urethra as in health or via nephrostomy/urostomy.
